<script>
  // Prompt for the password
  let password = prompt("Enter the password:");

  // Check the password
  if (password === "ai_tools") {
    // Show the main content for the correct password
    document.querySelector("#ai").style.display = "block";
  } else {
    // If the password is wrong, replace the page content
    document.body.innerHTML = `
      <h1>Access Denied</h1>
      <p>The password you entered is incorrect.</p>
      <p>If you don’t have the password, you can request it by filling out the form below:</p>
      <a href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScNSvOziB91CPHvO9YuB2rvGGUo2rvG6TaD8OpYp2ezAXJ6Kg/viewform?usp=header" 
         target="_blank" style="font-size: 1.2em; color: blue;">
         Request Password via Google Form
      </a>
    `;
  }
</script>

<div id="protected-content" style="display: none;">
  # Protected Content
  Welcome to the protected page. This content is only visible to users with the correct password.
</div>
